Uses of Package
org.dyn4j.collision.narrowphase

  • Packages that use org.dyn4j.collision.narrowphase 
    Package Description
    org.dyn4j.collision.continuous
    Sub package of the Collision package handling continuous collision detection.
    org.dyn4j.collision.manifold
    Sub package of the Collision package handling contact manifold generation.
    org.dyn4j.collision.narrowphase
    Sub package of the Collision package handling narrow-phase collision detection.
    org.dyn4j.dynamics
    Package containing the dynamics engine.
  • Classes in org.dyn4j.collision.narrowphase used by org.dyn4j.collision.continuous 
    Class and Description
    DistanceDetector
    Interface representing an algorithm to detect the distance between two convex shapes.
    Separation
    Represents a Separation of one Convex Shape between another.
  • Classes in org.dyn4j.collision.narrowphase used by org.dyn4j.collision.manifold 
    Class and Description
    Penetration
    Represents a Penetration of one Convex Shape into another.
  • Classes in org.dyn4j.collision.narrowphase used by org.dyn4j.collision.narrowphase 
    Class and Description
    AbstractFallbackCondition
    Abstract implementation of the FallbackCondition interface.
    DistanceDetector
    Interface representing an algorithm to detect the distance between two convex shapes.
    Epa.Edge
    Represents an Epa.Edge of the simplex.
    FallbackCondition
    Represents a condition that returns true to indicate a fallback NarrowphaseDetector should be used instead of the primary.
    MinkowskiPenetrationSolver
    Interface representing a sub algorithm for finding the penetration vector and depth using properties of the MinkowskiSum and Gjk termination information.
    MinkowskiSum
    Represents the Minkowski sum of the given Convex Shapes.
    MinkowskiSum.Point
    Represents a point in the MinkowskiSum.
    NarrowphaseDetector
    Represents an algorithm to detect whether two Convex Shapes are penetrating/overlapping each other.
    Penetration
    Represents a Penetration of one Convex Shape into another.
    Raycast
    Represents the result of a Ray cast against a Convex Shape.
    RaycastDetector
    Represents an algorithm for determining whether a Ray and a Convex Shape intersect, given the ray's maximum length and the convex shape's transform.
    Separation
    Represents a Separation of one Convex Shape between another.
    TypedFallbackCondition
    Represents a FallbackCondition that uses the Convex's class type to determine which pairs will be detected by the fallback NarrowphaseDetector.
  • Classes in org.dyn4j.collision.narrowphase used by org.dyn4j.dynamics 
    Class and Description
    NarrowphaseDetector
    Represents an algorithm to detect whether two Convex Shapes are penetrating/overlapping each other.
    Penetration
    Represents a Penetration of one Convex Shape into another.
    Raycast
    Represents the result of a Ray cast against a Convex Shape.
    RaycastDetector
    Represents an algorithm for determining whether a Ray and a Convex Shape intersect, given the ray's maximum length and the convex shape's transform.
